original_title: Spain Ambassador presents credentials to Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: The Government of the Kingdom of Spain, with the concurrence of the Government of Sri Lanka has appointed Juan Antonio March Pujol as Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Kingdom of Spain to Sri Lanka based in New Delhi.
He presented credentials to President Anura Kumara Dissanayake on 28 November at the Presidential Secretariat, Colombo.
